body:
Toby here (thats my IRL nickname) and im here to make a complaint about my donor rank not
coming

Yesterday, my friend bought me or he said he bought me donor and based from what the other
donors i play with said, after you pay for a donor rank, it automatically goes on your Minecraft Account,
i dont really have any solid proof right now but im really concerned, my friend is trying to get proof
and ill also try to get some proof,
but if you want to talk to him incase, here's his twitter https://twitter.com/Lukethebossman1

title: Complaint: My Donor Rank didnt come

replies.body: I think it can take up to 24 hours.
replies.body_tagged: I think it can take up to 24 hours.

replies.body:
3 things:
1st your friend maybe didn't buy the rank.
2nd you might have to wait it out.
3rd you can probably contact a sr mod about it.
replies.body_tagged:
3 things:

replies.body: regarding the 2nd part robin, just gave me an idea, ill ask him what time did in the day did he actually buy me it, as for the 3rd part, ill be waiting for a SR.MOD or maybe u could contact a SR.MOD like Zeusy for me since you guys probs have a Staff TS or Skype, and for the 1st part, i wont count on it yet
